articles.title: Kroger Albertsons US deal challenged over price rise fears - BBC.com
articles.description: The Federal Trade Commission says combining Kroger and Albertsons would be bad for American shoppers.
articles.content:
The US is taking legal action to block the merger of two major grocery chains, warning it would lead to higher prices.
The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) and a number of US states, said Kroger's pla… [+2853 chars]

articles.title: American husband and wife missing in Caribbean are likely dead, authorities say - ABC News
articles.description: Ralph Hendry and Kathy Brandel disappeared from their boat in Grenada.
articles.content:
An American husband and wife who went missing after three escaped prisoners boarded their boat in the Caribbean are likely dead, authorities said on Monday.
